name: Chronicles of cyberpunk
description: Chronicles of cyberpunk is an adventure in the city of the near future where power belongs to the Big Brother and his supercomputer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.3GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 260GTX, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 380 MB available space
